tool_description: Lookup currency exchange rates. Compare multiple currencies.
name: Currency exchange rates
title: Currency exchange rates

api_list.name: Lookup and compare currency exchange rates.
api_list.description: Return a list of currency-value pairs that are equal in value to each other.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of currencies to be returned. The first currency listed will be the currency the others are compared to. When empty, all available currencies are returned. This is formatted in a list of three-character ISO 4217 currency codes or currency names, separated by commas (,). These values are case insensitive. If the value of this parameter is 'help', the api will return a list with the available currencies.

optional_parameters.name: value
optional_parameters.description: The base amount of the base currency, `1` if left empty. This value is used to convert amounts other than 1 to other currencies.
